verses.verse: Man <S%H120><s%> that is born <S%H3205><s%> of a woman <S%H802><s%> is of few <S%H7116><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>and full <S%H7646><s%> of trouble. <S%H7267><s%>
He comes <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> like a flower, <S%H6731><s%> and is cut <S%H5243><s%> down: he flees <S%H1272><s%> also as a shadow, <S%H6738><s%> and continues <S%H5975><s%> not.
And does you open <S%H6491><s%> your eyes <S%H5869><s%> on such <S%H2088><s%> an one, and bring <S%H935><s%> me into judgment <S%H4941><s%> with you?
Who <S%H4310><s%> can bring <S%H5414><s%> a clean <S%H2889><s%> thing out of an unclean? <S%H2931><s%> not one. <S%H259><s%>

Seeing <S%H518><s%> his days <S%H3117><s%> are determined, <S%H2782><s%> the number <S%H4557><s%> of his months <S%H2320><s%> are with you, you have appointed <S%H6213><s%> his bounds <S%H2706><s%> that he cannot <S%H3808><s%> pass; <S%H5674><s%>
Turn <S%H8159><s%> from him, that he may rest, <S%H2308><s%> till <S%H5704><s%> he shall accomplish, <S%H7521><s%> as an hireling, <S%H7916><s%> his day. <S%H3117><s%>

For there is hope <S%H8615><s%> of a tree, <S%H6086><s%> if it be cut <S%H3772><s%> down, that it will sprout <S%H2498><s%> again, <S%H5750><s%> and that the tender <S%H3127><s%> branch thereof will not cease. <S%H2308><s%>
Though <S%H518><s%> the root <S%H8328><s%> thereof wax old <S%H2204><s%> in the earth, <S%H776><s%> and the stock <S%H1503><s%> thereof die <S%H4191><s%> in the ground; <S%H6083><s%>
Yet through the scent <S%H7381><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%> it will bud, <S%H6524><s%> and bring <S%H6213><s%> forth <S%H6213><s%> boughs <S%H7105><s%> like <S%H3644><s%> a plant. <S%H5194><s%>
But man <S%H1397><s%> dies, <S%H4191><s%> and wastes <S%H2522><s%> away: yes, man <S%H120><s%> gives <S%H1478><s%> up the ghost, <S%H1478><s%> and where <S%H346><s%> is he?
As the waters <S%H4325><s%> fail <S%H235><s%> from the sea, <S%H3220><s%> and the flood <S%H5104><s%> decays <S%H2717><s%> and dries <S%H3001><s%> up:

So man <S%H376><s%> lies <S%H7901><s%> down, <S%H7901><s%> and rises <S%H6965><s%> not: till <S%H5704><s%> the heavens <S%H8064><s%> be no <S%H1115><s%> more, they shall not awake, <S%H6974><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> be raised <S%H5782><s%> out of their sleep. <S%H8142><s%>

O that you would hide <S%H6845><s%> me in the grave, <S%H7585><s%> that you would keep me secret, <S%H5641><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> your wrath <S%H639><s%> be past, <S%H7725><s%> that you would appoint <S%H7896><s%> me a set <S%H2706><s%> time, and remember <S%H2142><s%> me!

If <S%H518><s%> a man <S%H1397><s%> die, <S%H4191><s%> shall he live <S%H2421><s%> again? all <S%H3605><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of my appointed <S%H6635><s%> time <S%H6635><s%> will I wait, <S%H3176><s%> till <S%H5704><s%> my change <S%H2487><s%> come. <S%H935><s%>
You shall call, <S%H7121><s%> and I will answer <S%H6030><s%> you: you will have a desire <S%H3700><s%> to the work <S%H4639><s%> of your hands. <S%H3027><s%>
For now <S%H6258><s%> you number <S%H5608><s%> my steps: <S%H6806><s%> do you not watch <S%H8104><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> my sin? <S%H2403><s%>
My transgression <S%H6588><s%> is sealed <S%H2856><s%> up in a bag, <S%H6872><s%> and you sew <S%H2950><s%> up my iniquity. <S%H5771><s%>

And surely <S%H199><s%> the mountains <S%H2022><s%> falling <S%H5307><s%> comes <S%H5034><s%> to nothing, <S%H5034><s%> and the rock <S%H6697><s%> is removed <S%H6275><s%> out of his place. <S%H4725><s%>

The waters <S%H4325><s%> wear <S%H7833><s%> the stones: <S%H68><s%> you wash <S%H7857><s%> away the things which grow <S%H5599><s%> out of the dust <S%H6083><s%> of the earth; <S%H776><s%> and you destroy <S%H6><s%> the hope <S%H8615><s%> of man. <S%H582><s%>
You prevail <S%H8630><s%> for ever <S%H5331><s%> against him, and he passes: <S%H1980><s%> you change <S%H8138><s%> his countenance, <S%H6440><s%> and send <S%H7971><s%> him away.
His sons <S%H1121><s%> come to honor, <S%H3513><s%> and he knows <S%H3045><s%> it not; and they are brought <S%H6819><s%> low, <S%H6819><s%> but he perceives <S%H995><s%> it not of them.
But his flesh <S%H1320><s%> on him shall have pain, <S%H3510><s%> and his soul <S%H5315><s%> within <S%H5921><s%> him shall mourn. <S%H56><s%>
